cgcloud__User_Setting__c.name: cgcloud__User_Setting__c
cgcloud__User_Setting__c.description: Object that's created to store user settings.

LastReferencedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

LastViewedDate.description: Most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

OwnerId.description: Standard field. Owner of the record

cgcloud__Bluetooth_Device__c.description: Determines the Bluetooth device to use with the Consumer Goods Cloud offline mobile app. Possible values are: Keyboard Scanner The default value is Scanner.

cgcloud__Current_Account_View__c.description: Reference to the view that was last used by the user.

cgcloud__Current_Promotion_View__c.description: Reference to the promotion that was last used by the user.

cgcloud__Display_Considered_Promotions_F.description: Specifies whether the Considered Promotions Filter field is shown in the Account Plan Filter.

cgcloud__Display_Weekend__c.description: Specifies whether the call calendar (Agenda) on mobility devices shows weekends.

cgcloud__Landing_Page__c.description: Specifies the landing or the first page that's to be shown whenever a user logs in the mobility application.

cgcloud__Picture_Quality__c.description: Picture quality of the attached image. To evaluate the picture quality when creating a new picture attachment on a mobility device, the picklist values require specification of Picklist_Toggle_Mapping_Extension.ValidationCode that represents the width-height-quality of the picture.

cgcloud__Route_In_Map__c.description: Indicates whether the navigation route is shown on the map.

cgcloud__Show_Agenda_Time__c.description: Specifies whether agenda time information is required in the agenda of the call calendar.

cgcloud__Show_Calendar_Week__c.description: Specifies whether calender week information is required in the agenda of the call calender.

cgcloud__Sync_Time_Interval__c.description: No longer in use. Indicated the time interval between sync requests.

cgcloud__Traffic_In_Map__c.description: Indicates whether traffic is shown on the map.

cgcloud__User__c.description: Reference to the user to which the segment belongs.

cgcloud__Works_On_Friday__c.description: Indicates the day of the week on which the user typically works. For example, used for capacity planning.

cgcloud__Works_On_Monday__c.description: Indicates the day of the week on which the user typically works. For example, used for capacity planning.

cgcloud__Works_On_Saturday__c.description: Indicates the day of the week on which the user typically works. For example, used for capacity planning.

cgcloud__Works_On_Sunday__c.description: Indicates the day of the week on which the user typically works. For example, used for capacity planning.

cgcloud__Works_On_Thursday__c.description: Indicates the day of the week on which the user typically works. For example, used for capacity planning.

cgcloud__Works_On_Tuesday__c.description: Indicates the day of the week on which the user typically works. For example, used for capacity planning.

cgcloud__Works_On_Wednesday__c.description: Indicates the day of the week on which the user typically works. For example, used for capacity planning.
